links.*: J.R.R. Tolkien and His Literary Resonances
The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power

wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|September}}
Events that occurred on 30 September.
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1923]]''' - Musician [[Donald Swann]] is born. 
* '''[[1944]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 82]].
* '''[[1946]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 106]].
* '''[[1947]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 111a]].
* '''[[1947]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes a [[Letter to Rosemary (30 September 1947)|letter to Rosemary]].
* '''[[1955]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 170]].
* '''[[1963]]''' - Music producer [[Carvin Knowles]] is born.
* '''[[1964]]''' - Actor [[Bernard Rebel]] dies.
* '''[[1979]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1979]] at the Eastgate Hotel.
* '''[[1997]]''' - The album ''[[An Evening in Rivendell]]'' is released.
* '''[[2000]]''' - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien and His Literary Resonances]]'' is published.
* '''[[2010]]''' - Jubilee for [[Mithlond, Göteborgs Tolkiensällskap|Mithlond]], the Gothenburg Tolkien Society of Sweden.
* '''[[2014]]''' - ''[[Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor]]'' is released in North America.
* '''[[2022]]''' - The episode [[Udûn (episode)|Udûn]] of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' is released online.

==In Arda==
* {{TA|3018}}:
** [[Crickhollow]] is raided by three [[Nazgûl|Black Riders]] in the early hours and [[Fredegar Bolger|Fatty Bolger]] alerts the village. The Black Riders run away. 
** The [[Prancing Pony|Inn]] at [[Bree]] is simultaneously raided but the Black Riders find only pillows in the Hobbits' beds. The ponies are lost. 
** [[Frodo Baggins|Frodo]] and his companions buy [[Bill the Pony]] from [[Bill Ferny]] and leave Bree together with [[Aragorn|Strider]].
** [[Gandalf]] comes to [[Crickhollow]] and sees Frodo's cloak outside. Losing hope, he reaches Bree at night. He meets [[Barliman Butterbur]] who apologises and tells him the Hobbits left with Strider.
** {{Cal Travel-Boromir}}<noinclude> [[Category:Dates|274]][[de:30. September]][[fi:30. syyskuuta]] </noinclude>
